spec.name: Sidi Moumen Mausoleum
spec.description: The Sidi Moumen Mausoleum (Marabout de Sidi Moumen) is a local religious shrine located in the vast Sidi Moumen neighborhood, which is named after the saint. The shrine is a center for local veneration, pilgrimage, and community gathering, reflecting the spiritual and social history of this large residential district.

people.comment: The revered local saint after whom the neighborhood is named.
